messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Weird Tsuba - COMMENT FROM OZ
messages.msgSnippet: Mates, Depending on the size of the hole , as a beer drinker it is (to me) very clearly a bottle opener.  Look at the shape of the hole.  Mr Budweiser
messages.messageBody:
Mates,
Depending on the size of "the hole", as a beer drinker it is (to me) very
clearly a bottle opener. Look at the shape of the hole. Mr Budweiser
(retired) would you care to re-visit this and give a revised opinion??? Oh,
it is also very clearly appears to be (what's the word?) modan??

Barry Thomas.

----- Original Message -----
From: <apedraza@...>
To: <nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, October 12, 2004 4:32 AM
Subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Weird Tsuba

Ron and Robert,

Thanks for your replies. I agree it doesn't look like anything
authentic, but I wanted the expertise of you guys in case I was wrong
due to my fairly recent and limited knowledge. Arigatou gozai mashita!

Best Regards,

Andres Pedraza
